sentences.en: Agencies frequently use publicity to warn consumers about dangerous products or fraudulent sales practices.
sentences.cn: 行政机关经常利用报纸就危险产品或虚假销售作法警告消费者.

Fraudulent business practices, such as shortchanging customers, are against the law.

sentences.en: Fraudulent loans led to the failure of many banks.
sentences.cn: 欺诈性贷款导致许多银行倒闭.

sentences.en: Helps keep your inbox free from unwanted, fraudulent and offensive emails.
sentences.cn: 帮助保持您的收件箱免受不必要的, 欺诈性和进攻性的电子邮件.

sentences.en: Now the joke about fraudulent securities was actually unfair.
sentences.cn: 现在取笑中国购买了欺诈性的证券其实是不公平的.

sentences.en: Such fraudulent representations are frequently in the form of advertisements or labels.

sentences.en: The alterations in the document were ruled to be criminally fraudulent.
sentences.cn: 篡改文件的行为被判为刑事欺诈.

sentences.en: The investigation has laid bare their fraudulent scheme.
sentences.cn: 这个调查把他们的骗局暴露无遗.

sentences.en: The police are investigating fraudulent claims for fire damage.
sentences.cn: 警方正在调查伪造的火灾索赔.

sentences.en: Those scandals have taken their toll, as has fraudulent investment banking research.
sentences.cn: 丑闻案的频频曝光, 投资银行报告失实.

sentences.en: Us state laws to protect investor against fraudulent trader in securities.
sentences.cn: 保护投资者使其免上诈欺性证券交易商当的州法.

sentences.en: You this is fraudulent action, or compensation, I go to or complain.
sentences.cn: 你们这是欺诈行为, 要么赔偿, 要么我去投诉.
